revised_title: Description of a New Family of Plants: Oxyoides and Remarks on the Family of Plants: Musa
tldr: The author describes a new family of plants called Oxyoides, which have leaves similar to those of the Tamarind and show great sensitivity when touched. The article also includes a discussion on the family of plants called Musa and a description of the Hirudinella Marina, or Sea Leach.
